quoteFirst: “There!” said Penrod, returning from performing this errand for the fourth time. “It's
quoteLast: , and I'm not goin' in to look at that ole clock again if I haf to die for it! I never heard anybody make such a fuss in my life, and I'm gettin' tired of it. Must think we want to be all night fixin' this cage for our panther! If you ask me to go and see what time it is again, Herman, I'm a-goin' to take back about askin' mamma at five o'clock, and THEN where'll you be?”
title: Penrod and Sam
author: Tarkington, Booth, 1869-1946
